name: Mutagun
description:
My submission to YUdum Dare 2!

You have been chosen to wield the MUTAGUN: a powerful weapon that causes an unstable mutation on any target it hits. Be careful - the MUTAGUN recharges slowly, and you need to use your skills to turn the attacking enemies against each other

Controls: 
- Left click to fire
- WASD to move
- Shift to run
